title: Custom filtering in console
body:
This feature would add an input box to the console that would winnow the displayed console items to only items that match the contents

Proposed Design
- Input box in top right of console in the same location as the find box on other tools
- The console items should be winnowed as the developer types (no need to commit with enter etc.)
- Searches all visible info (message, location, property key/values)
- Simple text search (could be done on the serialized version from the copy item command)
- Whitespace is treated as an AND operation (e.g. window foo would search for items containing window and foo)
- P2: Wild card support
